creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: alternating red and green silk bands, 4 horizontal and 13 vertical, with appliqued symbols; some narrow purple bands with silver/gold threads separate; thick multicolored soft paper fringe (3-1/2") attached to bottom with silver beads; black band at top with two 30" braid ties; black cotton lining
medium: Silk, cotton, paper, beads, metallic threads
title: Apron
